name: tin can
description: An unopened tin can with no label. Anything could be inside...

itemInteractions.Can opener: You use the can opener to open the tin can and peel back the lid. It's... brown... and wet. You take a sniff and wince. Fishy, too. It smells like cat food.

verbInteractions.Look at: An unopened tin can with no label. Anything could be inside...
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You pick up the unopened tin can.
verbInteractions.Open: The can could probably be opened by a can opener.
verbInteractions.Use: The can could probably be opened by a can opener.
verbInteractions.Drop/Leave: You set the tin can down.
verbInteractions.Shake/Ring: Shaking the can, you can tell that it is full of something dense.
verbInteractions.Flip: You flip the can over and there is nothing on the bottom.
